languages.text: Некоторые способности считаются атакующими действиями и могут быть использованы только единожды в ход, если таланты или иные способности персонажа не говорят обратное. Если персонаж совершил атакующее действие, он больше не может атаковать и лишается {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.

Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.
languages.original_text: Некоторые способности считаются атакующими действиями и могут быть использованы только единожды в ход, если таланты или иные способности персонажа не говорят обратное. Если персонаж совершил атакующее действие, он больше не может атаковать и лишается {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Certain abilities in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per turn unless affected by specific talents or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

Certain abilities in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per turn unless affected by specific talents or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

Certain abilities in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per turn unless affected by specific talents or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

languages.text: Algunas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del juego se consideran acciones de ataque y solo se pueden usar una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} a no ser que se beneficien de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} u otras capacidades que pueda tener el personaje. Si un ataque lanza una acción de ataque, no podrá atacar otra vez y perderá sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} restantes hasta el principio de su siguiente turno.
languages.original_text: Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Algunas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del juego se consideran acciones de ataque y solo se pueden usar una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} a no ser que se beneficien de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} u otras capacidades que pueda tener el personaje. Si un ataque lanza una acción de ataque, no podrá atacar otra vez y perderá sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} restantes hasta el principio de su siguiente turno.

languages.text: ゲーム中の特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は攻撃アクションとみなされ、キャラクターが持つ特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}や他のアビリティの影響を受けない限り、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に1回しか使用できない。 キャラクターが攻撃アクションを行った場合、残りの{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を失って、次のターンの開始まで再び攻撃することはできない。
languages.original_text: Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: ゲーム中の特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は攻撃アクションとみなされ、キャラクターが持つ特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}や他のアビリティの影響を受けない限り、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に1回しか使用できない。 キャラクターが攻撃アクションを行った場合、次のターンの開始まで、再び攻撃することはできない上、残りの{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}も失う。

languages.text: 游戏中的某些{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会被视为攻击行动，这些能力每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}只能使用一次，除非该角色拥有某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，或受到其他相关能力影响。 当角色进行攻击之后，就无法再次攻击了，而且会失去所有剩余的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，直到下个回合开始为止。
languages.original_text: Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 游戏中的某些{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会被视为攻击行动，这些能力每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}只能使用一次，除非该角色拥有某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，或受到其他相关能力影响。 当角色进行攻击之后，就无法再次攻击了，而且会失去所有剩余的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，直到下个回合开始为止。

languages.text: Bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} im Spiel gelten als Angriffsaktionen und können nur einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eingesetzt werden, es sei denn, sie werden durch bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} oder andere Fähigkeiten beeinflusst, die ein Charakter möglicherweise hat. Wenn ein Charakter eine Angriffsaktion durchführt, kann er nicht mehr angreifen und verliert seine restlichen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} bis zum Beginn seines nächsten Zuges.
languages.original_text: Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} im Spiel gelten als Angriffsaktionen und können nur einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden; es sei denn, sie werden durch bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} oder andere Fähigkeiten beeinflusst, die ein Charakter möglicherweise hat. Wenn ein Charakter eine Angriffsaktion durchführt, kann er nicht mehr angreifen und verliert seine restlichen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} bis zum Beginn seiner nächsten Runde.

languages.text: Certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du jeu sont considérées comme des actions d'attaque et ne peuvent être utilisées qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, à moins qu'elles ne soient affectées par des {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} précis ou d'autres capacités dont peut disposer le personnage. Si un personnage effectue une action d'attaque, il ne pourra plus attaquer et perdra ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} restants jusqu'à son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du jeu sont considérées comme des actions d’attaque et ne peuvent être utilisées qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, à moins qu'elles ne soient affectées par des {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} spécifiques ou d'autres capacités que le personnage peut avoir. Si un personnage effectue une action d'attaque, il ne pourra plus attaquer et perdra ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} restants jusqu'à son prochain tour.

languages.text: Oyundaki bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g} saldırı eylemi olarak kabul edilirler ve karakterin sahip olabileceği belirli {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceri{/g} veya diğer kabiliyetlerden etkilenmedikleri müddetçe her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} sadece bir kez kullanılabilirler. Karakter bir saldırı eylemi gerçekleştirirse bir daha saldıramaz, kalan {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanlarını{/g} kaybeder ve bir sonraki turun başlangıcına dek de hareket puanları tazelenmez.
languages.original_text: Certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in the game are considered attack actions and can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} unless affected by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} or other abilities a character might have. If a character performs an attack action, they will not be able to attack again and will lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the start of their next turn.
